body:
With the latest master kube-proxy either as a standalone process or as a part of hyperkube reports the following error:
```console
[root@kube-3 ~]# kubectl logs kube-proxy-6pvxk -n kube-system
error: v1alpha1.KubeProxyConfiguration: FeatureGates: ReadMapCB: expect { or n, but found ", error found in #10 byte of ...|reGates":"","healthz|..., bigger context ...|24h0m0s"},"enableProfiling":false,"featureGates":"","healthzBindAddress":"0.0.0.0:10256","hostnameOv|...
```
After editing kube-proxy daemonset to use version 1.9.3 image, kube-proxy stabilized.
```console
[root@kube-3 ~]# kubectl get pods --all-namespaces
NAMESPACE     NAME                                                READY     STATUS             RESTARTS   AGE
kube-system   canal-c26j5                                         3/3       Running            0          6d
kube-system   etcd-kube-3.sbezverk.cisco.com                      1/1       Running            0          6d
kube-system   kube-apiserver-kube-3.sbezverk.cisco.com            1/1       Running            0          6d
kube-system   kube-controller-manager-kube-3.sbezverk.cisco.com   1/1       Running            0          6d
kube-system   kube-dns-7965cbc99f-gpkjk                           3/3       Running            0          6d
kube-system   kube-proxy-6pvxk                                    0/1       CrashLoopBackOff   1          12s
kube-system   kube-scheduler-kube-3.sbezverk.cisco.com            1/1       Running            0          6d
```
 /kind bug

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
```console
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"9", GitVersion:"v1.9.3", GitCommit:"d2835416544f298c919e2ead3be3d0864b52323b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-02-07T12:22:21Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11+", GitVersion:"v1.11.0-alpha.0.607+62c5f21d5d5244", GitCommit:"62c5f21d5d5244833042a51aa141467556b67527", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-02-25T22:12:13Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration: Baremetal single node cluster
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): both Ubuntu and Centos
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`): 
- Install tools:
- Others:

reproducible in every case.

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Network.
labels.name: sig/network

title: kube-proxy in crashloop
